Disclosure Requirement E5-4 - Resource inflows
AR 21. Resource inflows may cover the following categories: IT equipment, textiles, furniture,
buildings, heavy machinery, mid-weight machinery, light machinery, heavy transport,
midweight transport, light transport and warehousing equipment. With regard to materials,
